title: International visitor spending in Paris 2010 to 2018
yAxis: International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In 2018 , the average International of visitor spending in the Paris amounted to 14.06 billion U.S. dollars .
According to the source , the International of visitor spending is defined as the total market value of all goods and services .
It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country .
gold: In 2018 , international visitor spending in Paris amounted to 14.06 billion U.S. dollars , up from 13.05 billion the previous year .
